Mount_Vernon.Yonkers Public Library:
The Yonkers Public Library in Yonkers, New York, consists of three branch libraries.
The main branch is the 'Yonkers Riverfront Library' which overlooks the Hudson River and New Jersey Palisades. Yonkers Riverfront Library is located in one of the former Otis Elevator buildings and it is across the street from the Yonkers Metro-North train station.
